name: Thraximundar
description:
"Risen from the grave once more and set on violence, Thraximundar demands sacrifice."
Done for Magic: The Gathering's Secret Lair Metal card set "Party Hard, Shred Harder"
In all 8 years I've been doing cards this is hands down my favorite assignment to date. Being the metal head I am I was glad I got to contribute to this set. Also cool seeing the band Lacuna Coil reveal them today! Massive shout out to the mighty Ovidio Cartagena for guiding me through this bloody and detail filled battlefield of a commission with his art direction.
